backend/main.mo: Implements a reminder actor with CRUD-style operations, tracking IDs and storing reminders in a map with completion and cancellation flags.
backend/migration.mo: Defines legacy-compatible types and a trivial migration function that returns the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence metadata linking feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, customization system, and data modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that pre-applies dark mode based on stored customization settings before loading React.
frontend/public/study-planner-mockup.htm: Standalone static mockup page using CDN React to visualize a themed Study Planner UI layout.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with routes for dashboard, subjects, utilities, customization, and wraps the app in an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AddChapterDialog: Dialog component for adding chapters, capturing name, lectures, and hours, and submitting via a callback.
frontend/src/components/AllChaptersBySub: Renders subjects with grouped chapter lists by status and completion counts using chapter and subject data hooks.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedIcon.tsx: Wraps a Lucide icon with optional active animation and size control.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Provides a React error boundary with UI for displaying errors, stack traces, and reset or navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Displays a fixed bottom navigation bar containing the SubjectsBar component.
frontend/src/components/ChapterCard.tsx: Shows chapter details with status badge, timers, and work controls, including live elapsed time tracking.
frontend/src/components/ChapterDetailPan: A slide-in panel for viewing and editing chapter details, lectures, hours, and status with persistence via hooks.
frontend/src/components/DashboardComplet: Generates a bar chart showing chapter completion percentages per subject.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the appâ€™s main layout with header, navigation, customization panel, identity controls, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/MonthGridCalenda: Renders a navigable month-view calendar grid with selectable dates and optional entry indicators.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsSec: Displays notifications for incomplete chapters, todos, and today's calendar entries.
frontend/src/components/OverallPerforman: Calculates score trends and renders a performance line chart with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Applies a fade transition when the router path changes.
Shows subject resources with the ability to add or delete resource entries.
frontend/src/components/RollbackTargetSa: Provides a confirmation dialog requiring explicit version input before allowing rollback operations.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkDial: Opens a dialog to copy or open a shareable link to the current app URL.
frontend/src/components/SubjectCompletio: Computes chapter completion stats and renders an animated progress bar and chapter grid with newly completed highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SubjectDeleteBut: Shows a confirmation dialog to delete a subject and triggers deletion with success toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/SubjectsBar.tsx: Displays a horizontal subject list with navigation, add/delete actions, and active subject highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SubjectsSelector: Provides a popover selector for navigating between subjects and adding new ones with validation.
frontend/src/components/TasksDrawer.tsx: Implements a slide-in menu with navigation links and subject-scoped task management features.
frontend/src/components/TestScoreChart.t: Renders a responsive SVG chart showing test scores as a line or bar graph with scales, gridlines, and data points.
frontend/src/components/TodoList.tsx: Renders a to-do list for a subject with add, toggle, and delete functionality using a custom todos hook.
frontend/src/customization/applyDarkMode: Applies or removes the document dark mode class based on override settings.
frontend/src/customization/Customization: A small icon button that triggers opening the customization settings panel.
Right-side settings sheet allowing users to adjust theme, study goals, lecture speed, sleep window, and other preferences.
Provides customization settings context, syncing changes and applying dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/customization/integration.t: Contains helper functions for notifications, sleep window checks, chapter display density, and study target calculations.
frontend/src/customization/settingsModel: Defines customization settings schema, defaults, and validation logic.
frontend/src/customization/useCustomizat: Manages saving, loading, applying, and deleting user-defined customization presets in local storage.
Loads, saves, and updates global customization settings with local storage persistence.
frontend/src/data/chapters.ts: Provides the chapter model and a long predefined list of initial chapters with metadata.
frontend/src/data/subjects.ts: Defines default subjects, icon mappings, and legacy route/name maps for compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEntries.ts: Manages calendar entries with localStorage persistence, providing CRUD helpers grouped by date keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterData.ts: Loads, saves, and syncs chapter data across tabs with versioned storage and update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTarget.ts: Handles a single countdown target date with validation and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Computes live countdown values to a given target date, updating every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimers.ts: Manages multiple countdown timers with schema validation, migration, selection, and robust localStorage handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentlyWorkingCh: Tracks chapter work sessions with timers, persistence, cross-tab sync, and elapsed-time helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardInside.ts: Empty hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardNote.ts: Stores and updates a dashboard note string with versioned localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardTitle.ts: Stores and updates a dashboard title with versioned localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login flow, persistence, and context via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Manages a notes list with add, update, delete operations and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a placeholder hook for future backend React Query integration, currently returning actor state.
frontend/src/hooks/useResources.ts: Manages per-subject study resources with localStorage persistence and migration from legacy formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyLog.ts: Tracks study log entries in localStorage and triggers sleep-window warnings when logging time.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjectDetails.ts: Stores and updates per-subject details like lecture count and targets with versioned localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjects.ts: Handles subject list management with migration, add/delete operations, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useTests.ts: Manages tests and scores with add/update/delete operations and chart settings stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodos.ts: Provides per-subject todo management with migration from legacy data and localStorage syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodosAll.ts: Reads all todos across subjects from storage and refreshes on storage changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color themes, utilities, animations, and custom UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/appLocalStorage.ts: Defines all localStorage keys used by the app and utility functions to clear or retrieve them.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Stores app version metadata and provides helpers for rollback validation and persistence.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider, then renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarDashboard.tsx: Implements a calendar dashboard with month navigation and daily work item CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/CountdownTimer.manual: Manual test checklist covering creation, selection, renaming, deletion, and persistence of countdown timers.
frontend/src/pages/CountdownTimer.tsx: UI and logic for managing multiple countdown timers, including creation, editing, deletion, and live countdown display.
frontend/src/pages/Customize.tsx: Customization page for managing subjects, display and study settings, and user presets with rollback info.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard showing study stats, active chapters, customization-driven metrics, and editable title/note.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Implements a notes page with create, edit, delete, and selection functionality using local note state and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Renders a subject detail view with chapter management, subject metadata editing, progress tracking, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/Tests.tsx: Provides UI for managing tests, editing details, adding scores, and visualizing performance through charts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, color variables, typography, container settings, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project metadata, requested rollback features, and project state for deployment version restoration.
